product_name: REI  Midweight Polartec Power Dry Long Underwear Bottoms - Men's - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Working up a sweat in cold weather? The men's REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry Long Underwear Bottoms move moisture away from your skin and dry quickly so you can stay and play longer.
